text: 8.12: Mt 13.42 naŋga, 21.43 naŋga, 22.13 naŋga, 25.30 naŋga, Lu 13.28 naŋga, 2 Pi 2.17 naŋga, Ju 1.13Hara krunavundi kuha nuŋandɨ tɨwɨyɨ kɨyɨhɨyɨ hañɨrɨm kɨyɨmandɨyu vata yɨhɨramami haŋɨnɨŋ, Got kavarɨti tapɨra kɨvɨmɨŋgwɨ humba ndambu indɨhuta kɨyɨmandɨyu. Pɨhu kɨvɨmɨŋgwɨ kandɨhañɨ irɨharɨha mɨka satɨpɨrɨmandɨyu, vami.
